name: Isekai bar
description:
A simple clicker game made in Godot.

Story

You are the owner of a bar. Execute skills to gain experience and level them up.

Controls

You only need to do clicks with your mouse.

Credits

Music and sound effects obtained from

https://www.zapsplat.com

Fonts

2K4S Font by Pixel Kitchen

Marginalia Font by Pixel Kitchen

Icons

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

Game Engine

This game uses Godot Engine.

https://godotengine.org/license

Assets

Kenney Assets

Emotes by Pipoya

Characters by Atelier Pixerelia

Made by

Saralice Games

http://saralice.byethost7.com/games/
